Description:
Detects execution of the "VMwareToolBoxCmd.exe" with the "script" and "set" flag to setup a specific script to run for a specific VM state

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Persistence Via VMwareToolBoxCmd.EXE VM State Change Script
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\vmwaretoolboxcmd.exe' and original_file_name = 'toolbox-cmd.exe') and (command like '% script %' and command like '% set %'))
